summary: E2E testing of Gemma Offline AI feature for Rural India (Srikakulum Telugu & Chickmagalur Kannada). All 17 backend API tests passed. Frontend UI loads correctly with language selector (English, Telugu, Kannada, Hindi), quick questions, career categories, and chat functionality working. Landing page has Gemma Offline AI link with Rural badge.
passed_tests: GET /api/gemma/status returns correct status with model info (gemma-3n-270m)
GET /api/gemma/languages returns all 4 languages (Telugu, Kannada, Hindi, English)
POST /api/gemma/chat works with Telugu query in offline mode
POST /api/gemma/chat works with Kannada query in offline mode
POST /api/gemma/chat works with English query
POST /api/gemma/chat returns government schemes info (PMKVY, Mudra, Skill India)
POST /api/gemma/chat returns related career resources
GET /api/gemma/career-data returns LIG workers career guidance in English
GET /api/gemma/career-data returns career guidance in Telugu
GET /api/gemma/career-data returns career guidance in Kannada
POST /api/gemma/doers-score calculates score for rural users (300-900 range)
POST /api/gemma/doers-score returns higher score for graduates
POST /api/gemma/doers-score works with minimum input
GET /api/gemma/quick-questions/en returns English questions
GET /api/gemma/quick-questions/te returns Telugu questions
GET /api/gemma/quick-questions/kn returns Kannada questions
GET /api/gemma/offline-cache returns FAQ, career data, languages for PWA sync
Gemma Offline AI page loads at /gemma route
Language selector works for English, Telugu, Kannada, Hindi
Quick questions display correctly in each language
Online/Offline status indicator works (shows 'Online - Full AI Available')
Chat input and send button work correctly
Career Categories section shows Digital Skills, Agriculture Tech, Healthcare, Skilled Trades
Region info card shows for Telugu (Srikakulum) and Kannada (Chickmagalur)
Landing page /welcome has Gemma Offline AI link with Rural badge
Navigation from Landing Page to /gemma works correctly
Content Command Centre still works correctly (regression test passed)
critical_code_review_comments: Gemma Offline AI implementation is complete and well-structured for rural India use case
All UI elements have proper data-testid attributes for testing
Offline cache with pre-loaded FAQ responses in Telugu and Kannada works correctly
DoersScore calculation for rural users uses modified algorithm (education, skills, certifications, language proficiency)
Career guidance data includes LIG workers sectors: Digital Skills, Agriculture Tech, Healthcare, Skilled Trades
Government schemes info (PMKVY, Mudra, Skill India) properly integrated
seed_data_creation: None - used API endpoints directly with pre-loaded offline cache
context_for_next_testing_agent: Gemma Offline AI is a new feature for Rural India targeting Srikakulum (Telugu) and Chickmagalur (Kannada) regions. Uses Gemma 3n (270M parameters) model concept with offline-first approach. Key features: 1) Language selector for English, Telugu, Kannada, Hindi, 2) Quick questions in each language, 3) Career guidance for LIG workers (Digital Skills, Agriculture Tech, Healthcare, Skilled Trades), 4) DoersScore calculation for rural users (300-900 range), 5) Government schemes info (PMKVY, Mudra, Skill India), 6) Offline cache with pre-loaded FAQ responses. When online, uses Emergent LLM (Gemini) for responses. Backend APIs at /api/gemma/* all working. Frontend at /gemma route. Landing page has Gemma Offline AI link with Rural badge.
